oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarifying the Characteristics and Exploring the Collaboration of Citizenship and Character Education in South Korea
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Park, Sun Young
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Purpose: This paper seeks to illuminate the background of citizenship and character education in South Korea in order to better determine a means of collaboration between the two goals.Method: The paper is based on the qualitative analysis of the official documents and law in relation to citizenship and character education.Findings: The paper finds the differences and the similarities of citizenship and character education and there are increasing needs for both educational initiatives in terms of social and national development of South Korea.
